-- input.json --
{
  "dependencies": [
    {
      "import": "myapp.com/web",
      "type": "Log"
    }
  ],
  "externals": [
  ],
  "target": "gen/web"
}

-- expect.txt --
&web.log{d: "default"}

-- main.go --
package main

import (
  "os"
  "fmt"
  "github.com/hexops/valast"
  genweb "myapp.com/gen/web"
)

func main() {
  actual := genweb.Load()
  fmt.Fprintf(os.Stdout, "%s\n", valast.String(actual))
}

-- go.mod --
module myapp.com

require (
  github.com/hexops/valast v1.4.1
)

-- web/web.go --
package web

type Log interface {
  Info(s string)
}

type log struct {
  d string
}

func (l *log) Info(s string) {}

func Default() Log {
  return &log{"default"}
}
